body:
It wasn't disabled on purpose, it just wasn't explicitly enabled.
To change this, we'll need to modify the tipgodoc server's "health check"
to wait for the index to be ready.

On 26 February 2015 at 02:11, speter <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Indexing (search) is available on https://golang.org/ but not on
> https://tip.golang.org/ . Is there any particular reason for this? (A
> quick search of issues and the groups didn't seem to bring up anything
> relevant.)
>
> Unless it has been disabled on purpose, I think it would be preferable if
> search for tip worked just like on https://golang.org/ , especially
> considering that tip pages are excluded from search engines.
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9996>.
>
